name: papercraft-web
description: Web-based tool to unwrap 3D models into printable papercraft patterns

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:frontend: wait-on http://localhost:3000/api/status && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.docs:build: asciidoctor docs/*.adoc && mkdir -p frontend/public/docs && cp -r docs/* frontend/public/docs/
scripts.test: npm run test:integration && npm run test:browser

author: Rodrigo Rivas Costa
